verses.verse: <S%G2532>It<s%> <S%G1096>happened<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> as <S%G846>he<s%> was <S%G1321>teaching<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2411>temple<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> preaching the Good <S%G2097>News,<s%> that the <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1122>scribes<s%> came <S%G2186>to<s%> him <S%G4862>with<s%> the <S%G4245>elders.<s%>

<S%G1437>But<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> we <S%G2036>say,<s%> <S%G1537><s%> 'From <S%G444>men,<s%>' <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> will <S%G2642>stone<s%> <S%G2248>us,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> they <S%G1511>are<s%> persuaded <S%G3982>that<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G2076>was<s%> a <S%G4396>prophet.<s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G756>He<s%> began to <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G4314>the<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3850>parable.<s%> <S%G5100>"A<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G5452>planted<s%> a <S%G290>vineyard,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1554>rented<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> <S%G1554>out<s%> to some <S%G1092>farmers,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> went into another <S%G589>country<s%> for a <S%G2425>long<s%> <S%G5550>time.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G1722>At<s%> the proper <S%G2540>season,<s%> he <S%G649>sent<s%> a <S%G1401>servant<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G1092>farmers<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G1325>collect<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> share <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G2590>fruit<s%> of the <S%G290>vineyard.<s%> <S%G1161>But<s%> the <S%G1092>farmers<s%> <S%G1194>beat<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> and <S%G1821>sent<s%> him <S%G1821>away<s%> <S%G2756>empty.<s%>

<S%G1161>The<s%> <S%G2962>lord<s%> of the <S%G290>vineyard<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G5101><s%> 'What shall I <S%G4160>do?<s%> I will <S%G3992>send<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G5207>son.<s%> It may <S%G2481>be<s%> that seeing <S%G5126>him,<s%> they will <S%G1788>respect<s%> <S%G5126>him.<s%>'

<S%G1161>"But<s%> when the <S%G1092>farmers<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> they <S%G1260>reasoned<s%> <S%G4314>among<s%> <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3778><s%> 'This <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G2818>heir.<s%> <S%G1205>Come,<s%> <S%G615>let<s%>'s kill <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> the <S%G2817>inheritance<s%> may <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G2257>ours.<s%>'

<S%G2532>They<s%> <S%G1544>threw<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> out <S%G1854>of<s%> the <S%G290>vineyard,<s%> and <S%G615>killed<s%> <S%G5101>him.<s%> What <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G4160>will<s%> the <S%G2962>lord<s%> of the <S%G290>vineyard<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> to <S%G846>them?<s%>

He will <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G622>destroy<s%> <S%G5128>these<s%> <S%G1092>farmers,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> will <S%G1325>give<s%> the <S%G290>vineyard<s%> to <S%G243>others.<s%>" <S%G1161>When<s%> they <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3361>it,<s%> they said, "May it never <S%G1096>be!<s%>"

<S%G1161>But<s%> he <S%G1689>looked<s%> at <S%G846>them,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G3767>"Then<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G3037><s%> 'The stone <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G3618>builders<s%> <S%G593>rejected,<s%> the <S%G3778>same<s%> was <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G1519>the<s%> <S%G2776>chief<s%> <S%G1137>cornerstone?<s%>'

<S%G3956>Everyone<s%> who <S%G4098>falls<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G3037>stone<s%> will be <S%G4917>broken<s%> to <S%G1161>pieces,<s%> but it will <S%G3039>crush<s%> <S%G3739%G99999>whomever<s%> it <S%G4098>falls<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>to<s%> <S%G3039>dust.<s%>"

<S%G2532>The<s%> chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G2212>sought<s%> to <S%G1911>lay<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1722>that<s%> <S%G846>very<s%> <S%G5610>hour,<s%> <S%G2532>but<s%> they <S%G5399>feared<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> â€” <S%G1063>for<s%> they <S%G1097>knew<s%> <S%G3754>he<s%> had <S%G2036>spoken<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3850>parable<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

<S%G1455>They<s%> <S%G3906>watched<s%> <S%G649>him,<s%> and sent out <S%G1455>spies,<s%> who <S%G5271>pretended<s%> <S%G1438><s%> <S%G1511><s%> to be <S%G1342>righteous,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they might <S%G1949>trap<s%> him in something <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G3056>said,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> as to <S%G3860>deliver<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> up <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G746>power<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> of the <S%G2232>governor.<s%>

<S%G2532>They<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004><s%> <S%G1320>"Teacher,<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> you <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1321>teach<s%> what is <S%G2532>right,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2983>aren't<s%> partial to <S%G4383>anyone,<s%> <S%G235%G99999>but<s%> <S%G225>truly<s%> <S%G1321>teach<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1161>He<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G5106>"Then<s%> <S%G591>give<s%> to <S%G2541>Caesar<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> that are <S%G2541>Caesar<s%>'s, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> that are <S%G2316>God<s%>'s."

<S%G2532>They<s%> <S%G3756>weren't<s%> <S%G2480>able<s%> to <S%G1949>trap<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> in his <S%G4487>words<s%> <S%G1726>before<s%> the <S%G2992>people.<s%> They <S%G2296>marveled<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G612>answer,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> were <S%G4601>silent.<s%>
<S%G1161><s%> <S%G5100>Some<s%> of the <S%G4523>Sadducees<s%> came <S%G4334>to<s%> <S%G483>him,<s%> those <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G3361>deny<s%> that there <S%G1511>is<s%> a <S%G386>resurrection.<s%>

They <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004><s%> <S%G1320>"Teacher,<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G1125>wrote<s%> to <S%G2254>us<s%> that <S%G1437>if<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%>'s <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G599>dies<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> a <S%G1135>wife,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3778>he<s%> <S%G599>is<s%> <S%G815>childless,<s%> <S%G2443><s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> should <S%G2983>take<s%> the <S%G1135>wife,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> raise <S%G1817>up<s%> <S%G4690>sons<s%> for <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> <S%G5101>whose<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%> of <S%G846>them<s%> will <S%G1096>she<s%> <S%G1063>be?<s%> For the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> as a <S%G1135>wife.<s%>"

<S%G1161>But<s%> those <S%G3588>who<s%> are considered <S%G2661>worthy<s%> to <S%G5177>attain<s%> to <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G165>age<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G1060>marry,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> are given in <S%G1548>marriage.<s%>

<S%G3777>For<s%> they <S%G1410>can't<s%> <S%G599>die<s%> any <S%G2089>more,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> they <S%G1526>are<s%> like the <S%G2465>angels,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> <S%G5207>sons<s%> of the <S%G386>resurrection.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%> are <S%G1453>raised,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G3377>showed<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G942>bush,<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> he <S%G3004>called<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2316><s%> 'The God of <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> <S%G2532>the<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G2464>Isaac,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G2384>Jacob.<s%>'

<S%G1161>Now<s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> of the <S%G2198>living,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> are <S%G2198>alive<s%> to <S%G846>him.<s%>"
